Title: Prison Ball
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Eduardo Javier Canto, Ryan Maldonado, Cole Maliska (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: The murder of a 10 year old witness sends Atwater and Ruzek undercover as inmates in a federal prison.
